title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama models into LangChain LLM, chat and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like); manage models, chats, docs, RAG, users.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI that wraps ollama CLI for interactive model selection and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings & Llama-3.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; chat, pull, delete, list models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that proxies to Ollama; dark mode, markdown, code highlight.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers prompts using any Ollama model; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeGemma, etc.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-command Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, RAG, Chroma, and Nginx.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama generators & embedders; pip install ollama-haystack.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with async methods for chat, pull, list, delete.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Simple Flask/React GUI to chat with Ollama models; includes Docker build.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses Ollama models for summarizing notes and Q&A over vault.

title: ollama-zsh
summary: Zsh plugin that adds aliases and completions for ollama CLI commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await wrappers over Ollama REST API.
